This is a really dope class!

I really like how Tom told us how those stories happens and make those stories more interesting, but the exam is so hard that though I think I did memorize and realize most thing, I still cannot get good score. But I did like Tom's lessons.
The class is very interesting but the tests are so hard to prepare, especially for the vocabulary part.

首先我要稱讚Tom的教學平穩而扎實，只是聲音有點小太催眠，希望能用麥克風講課。再來是希望改善的地方。一、減少補課次數；我能理解老師為了參加研討會而必須調課的困擾，但我們也有自己個人時間的安排，過多的補課老實說真的有影響到（尤其是社團）。非不得以不要調，真的沒辦法至多調兩次就好。二、考試減少單字和ID題，把那些額度拿去考申論題。讀英文系的目標是增進思辨能力，學文學固然需要記得文本內容，但更重要的是思考文本涵義並將之內化；而申論題就是能檢驗這項能力的題型。
Tom is great!
It will be better if the make-up class will not hold in Ji Tao building because it is inconvenient to those people who have class down the hill who has class from 4 to 6.
雖然這學期瘋狂調課，我還是很喜歡老師溫柔敦厚偶爾又帶點詼諧的上課方式。
I have learned a lot from this course, and Tom really aroused my interest in reading those works.
老師認真、講話幽默，但希望能減少請假並補課的狀況，因為利用晚上補課精神差，且補課影響進度，可能因此更動考試日期
這學期太常調課了，而且山上的教室座位太少，坐後面也看不太到

Although many classes are moved to another time in this time, Professor really taught literature in an interesting way.
I really enjoyed the lecture.
Thank you so much.
I think the type of the exams should be adjusted or students cannot afford it. (There are too many words that we should memorize.)

I think the right answer of our midterm exams could be provided, consider that we have to do reviewing for the final. And the final is a bit too hard to prepare. There were many texts to cover, I study and study... still can't finish it.
考試好難

希望老師對文本單字能有統一的解釋，然後盡量減少晚上的加課，不然很容易撞到別的課就沒辦法去上課。
考試內容希望不要有太多背誦題，可以改成申論題等開放式回答。
調課太多，整學期大概5、6堂，大概三分之一的課都給他調走了，強人所難，畢竟大家課表都不一樣，考的東西太細太瑣碎，對未來幫助不大
Thank you for this semester.
Professor is quite humorous! By the way, I hope professor can reduce the frequency of changing the class.
